title: If someone in 2120 or another year in the future discovered time travel and they travelled to 2020 and changed something, would we in 2020 notice the change? - Quora

response.answer_text: What’s the change? Did they step on a bug? Or did they kill Justice Ruth Bader Ginsberg? As you see a change would be seen as a natural event through our eyes Theoretically if they changed something that was in OUR present’s past then we would live through the original events while a new timeline is created with the changed events. That may or may not be how it works but we’ll never know cause you can’t travel to the past.
